title: Will the EU deforestation-free products regulation (EUDR) reduce tropical forest loss? Insights from three producer countries
content:
Publication date: January 2025

Source: Ecological Economics, Volume 227

Author(s): Roldan Muradian, Raras Cahyafitri, Tomaso Ferrando, Carolina Grottera, Luiz Jardim-Wanderley, Torsten Krause, Nanang I. Kurniawan, Lasse Loft, Tadzkia Nurshafira, Debie Prabawati-Suwito, Diaz Prasongko, Paula A. Sanchez-Garcia, Barbara Schr√∂ter, Diana Vela-Almeida
